Humidity: 80 %

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
